Text: Email Marketing Works Cheap EffectiveIMAGEExplode Your Business With Internet Marketing Direct Email Works Youre Reading This Email Right Just Imagine That We Sent Out Another Emails Like This One Why It Works If you have a product or service that people want at a desirable price then Direct Email works because it is cost effective You can deliver your message to Million people for only Thats right its less than a classified ad that would only reach a fraction of the audience What We Offer You We offer a suite of services to make your Direct Email Marketing efforts truly effortless for you Its a complete turnkey solution for youbut you can obviously choose to participate in any one aspect of it if you like This services include Direct Email Sending Service We can send out up to Million emails a week for you alone for only million and we supply email addresses Email Creation Service We can create an effective email piece for your campaign BulletProof Direct Hosting We can host your site so it does not get shut down for Direct marketing for as little as per month Remove List Management We will manage your remove requests for FREE Easy As Its easy to get started Simply place your order today and start mailing the same day Hosting is usually set up the same day or the very next day Creative work can usually be turned around sameday also So you can actually be mailing your message to Million people today Simply call to get more information NOTE This email was sent to you because your email is part of a targeted optin list If you do not wish to receive further mailings please click below and enter your email at the bottom of the page You may then restassured that you will never receive another email from us again UNSUBSCRIBE ME PLEASE
